question: Just went to get my eyes checked.  While golfing it becomes frustrating to watch the ball flight.  Noticed the double vision for several months up to a year.  Person checking my eyes had a bad reaction when she noticed my double vision was vertical.  Turn my head to the right no double vision, turn to the left singular objects become double slanting from my nose down to the floor  Also have a loud constant ring in my ears, typically wake up with a small headache.  On medication XARELTO for DVT.Is this Type 2 Diabetes, at this point hopefully?  Family history of diabetes, Mother, Sister, Uncle. What do I need to do?Heavy, about 30 pounds over average.  Drink beer, eat well, walk the course while golfing. 49 year old male.
title: Vertical diplopia and Ringing in ears
